meanings.definition: A group or set of eight.
meanings.sent1: She invited an octad of friends to her birthday party.
meanings.sent2: The octad of colorful balloons added a festive touch to the room.
meanings.sent3: The octad of puppies running around the yard was a delightful sight.
meanings.sent4: The octad of stars in the night sky shone brightly above.
meanings.sent5: The octad of cupcakes on the table looked too tempting to resist.

meanings.definition: A sequence of eight musical notes.
meanings.sent1: The composer wrote a beautiful melody using an octad of notes.
meanings.sent2: The musician played an octad of notes on the piano with skill.
meanings.sent3: The octad of musical notes danced through the air, creating a harmonious tune.
meanings.sent4: Her voice soared through the octad of notes like a bird in flight.
meanings.sent5: The octad of musical notes intertwined to form a captivating symphony.
